page.title: 09Bwlch-y-groes 8th June (1)
page.content: Last Saturday 8th June,1985,I walked ten miles in a sponsored walk.We are collecting money for the National Eisteddfod of Wales in Fishguard in 1986.We have to collect Â£600.Last year before Christmas we had a coffee evening and we raised Â£200.There were nine people walking.Their names were Mr.and Mrs.Thomas,my mother,Vera Richards and I,Gill Davies,her friend Mary White,Robina Elis-Gruffydd,Angela Williams and Cliff Salmon and his dog Hannah.I was the only child walking.When we had walked nearly five miles the people behind us saw a fox running across the road.I would have liked to see the fox.I found a pound note and I was really happy.All the other children rode ten miles.They had to cycle round the block from Bwlch-y-groes to Clun and Waunlwyd four times.
